title: [K-12] Information Problem-Solving (IPS) Skill Development Program for Academic Text Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Academic resource retrieval and basic research paper writing experience
context.additional_context: A program systematically developing information problem-solving skills by combining online training and offline workshops based on the 4C/ID model

learning_goals: Learners can systematically define complex academic problems and develop information-gathering plans.
Learners can select and critically evaluate primary/secondary sources with academic credibility.
Learners can structure academic texts according to research topics and ethically manage references.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
